description: '''Marvin Eugene O'Neal''', known by his [[stage name]] '''Marv Won''', is an American rapper and record producer from [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]]. He is a member of the [[underground hip hop]] group, The Fat Killahz (with [[Fatt Father]], [[Bang Belushi]] and [[King Gordy]]) and rap duo Twin Towers. In 2021, he received a Detroit Music Award nomination for Outstanding Rap MC at the 30th [[Detroit Music Awards]].
